name: PDF Reader
description: A PDF reader with page parent (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from langchain_community.document_loaders import PyPDFLoader
from langchain_text_splitters import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
from langchain.schema.document import Document
from typing import List
import uuid

class PDFReaderComponent(Component):
    display_name = "PDF Reader"
    description = "A PDF reader with page parent"
    icon = "file-text"
    name = "PDFReader"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="pdf",
            display_name="PDF",
            file_types=["pdf"],
            info=f"Supported file types: PDF",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="PDF Reader Output", name="splits", method="build_output"),
    ]
        
    def build_output(self) -> List[Data]:
     loader = PyPDFLoader(self.pdf)
     pages = loader.load()
     docs = []
     for p in pages:
         content = p.page_content.strip().lower()
         if content:
             doc = " ".join(content.split())
             docs.append(Document(page_content=doc, metadata=p.metadata))
    
    
     r_splitter = RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter(
        chunk_size=1000,
        chunk_overlap=0,
     )
     
     splits = r_splitter.split_documents(docs)
     
     data = []
     
     for s in splits:
         doc = next(doc for doc in docs if doc.metadata["page"] == s.metadata["page"])
         data.append(Data(
             text = doc.page_content, 
             chunk= s.page_content, 
             page = s.metadata["page"],
             source = s.metadata["source"],
             id = str(uuid.uuid4())
            )
        )
    
     self.status = data
     
     return data
code.name: code

     loader = PyPDFLoader(self.pdf)
